*ConvertWAVToMono5ms(String fileName):*

{{{
String[] del = new String[4];
del[0] = "cmd";
del[1] = "/C";
del[2] = "del";
del[3] = "input.wav";
printToConsole("Starting: ", del);
Process p = Runtime.getRuntime().exec(del);
p.waitFor();

}}}
